title: Matt Mann's swimming techniques for girls
brief_description: A demonstration of Matt Mann’s teaching principles applied to a group of girls. The crawl, breast stroke, back stroke, and butterfly stroke are demonstrated in both regular and slow motion photography.
description: A demonstration of Matt Mann’s teaching principles applied to a group of girls. The crawl, breast stroke, back stroke, and butterfly stroke are demonstrated in both regular and slow motion photography.
